title: Mathematics Curriculum Material Redesign for Teacher Learning Support

context.prior_knowledge: Content knowledge in mathematics and understanding of basic teaching methodologies
context.additional_context: Targeting learners with work-based math instruction experience, aiming to strengthen competencies in analyzing and redesigning curriculum materials

learning_goals: Learners will be able to analyze the structural characteristics and educational support elements of curriculum materials.
Learners will be able to critically evaluate existing materials according to instructional design principles for educational curriculum resources.
Learners will be able to apply teaching strategies for correcting students' mathematical misconceptions in material development.
Learners will be able to redesign curriculum materials for inquiry-based mathematics instruction.
It can integrally present implementation guidelines and theoretical foundations of the curriculum.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
